main.name: Ngwu Stephen
main.bio: I am a skilled software developer with 3 years of experience in the industry. Throughout my career, I have worked on various software projects and have gained expertise in front-end and back-end, among other things. I hold a degree in Computer Science from University of Nigeria, where I honed my technical skills and developed a strong foundation in computer science. I have delivered successful software solutions that have helped my clients achieve their business goals.My work is characterized by attention to detail, efficiency, and creativity. I am passionate about delivering high-quality software solutions that meet or exceed my clients' expectations. My problem-solving skills, combined with my strong communication and collaboration abilities, make me a valuable asset to any software development team. I believe that software development is an ever-evolving field that requires continuous learning and improvement. That is why I am always exploring new technologies and seeking out opportunities to develop my skills further. Thank you for visiting my website. If you have any questions or would like to discuss a potential project, please do not hesitate to contact me through email. I look forward to hearing from you!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for your software. And I am also open for remote jobs and gigs.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developing and engineering frontend and backend based solutions. Developed smart contract for accepting ETH payments

testimonials.text: Stephen is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his problem solving skill really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Working with Stephen has been AWESOME, he makes work so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
